title: Bug 120216: Group dialog should be shown even when dataset is not set.
OB: An error is shown when the group dialog is not shown.
EB: The group dialog should be shown even if the dataset is not set, as per the template requirements. No error should be displayed.
SR:
1. Open the application.
2. Navigate to the group dialog section.
3. Ensure that no dataset is set.
4. Verify that the group dialog is shown and no error is displayed.
